content.text:
# Draft:DEVER (software company)

DEVER Corp. (Korean: 데버) is a South Korean software development company.
Founded in 2020, it provides services such as web and mobile application development,
online payment systems, and clinical data management platforms.
The company is headquartered in Seongdong District, Seoul.
Overview
DEVER began as a web and mobile application development firm and later expanded its scope
to clinical data management systems (CDMS) and integrated payment gateway solutions.
Its projects include cloud-based data management tools and enterprise-level platforms.

External links
